com.ardock.moodapp.moodock.lib.data.persistence.utils

Interface IStorable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDBHelper, MoodockDBHelper

    public interface IStorable
    IStorable is an interface to be used by classes that extends SQLiteOpenHelper class.
    See Also:
    SQLiteOpenHelper

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearAllTables()
      Clear all the tables of the database (drop and recreate the tables).
      void clearAllTables(SQLiteDatabase database)
      Clear all the tables of the database (drop and recreate the tables).
      void close()
      Close any open database object.
      SQLiteDatabase getDatabase()
      Get the database used by converters.
      String getDatabaseName()
      Return the name of the database being opened, as given to the constructor.
      SQLiteDatabase getWritableDatabase()
      Create and/or open a database that will be used for reading and writing.
      void putOpenedDatabase()
      Put an opened database to be used by converters.

    • Method Detail

      • clearAllTables

        void clearAllTables(SQLiteDatabase database)
        Clear all the tables of the database (drop and recreate the tables).
        Parameters:
        database - the application database.

      • clearAllTables

        void clearAllTables()
        Clear all the tables of the database (drop and recreate the tables).

        This method uses getWritableDatabase() method to obtain an opened database.

      • getWritableDatabase

        SQLiteDatabase getWritableDatabase()
        Create and/or open a database that will be used for reading and writing. The first time this is called, the database will be opened and on* methods will be called.
        Returns:
        a read/write database object valid until close() is called.
        Throws:
        SQLiteException - if the database cannot be opened for writing
        See Also:
        SQLiteOpenHelper.getWritableDatabase()

      • close

        void close()
        Close any open database object.
        See Also:
        SQLiteOpenHelper.close()

      • getDatabaseName

        String getDatabaseName()
        Return the name of the database being opened, as given to the constructor.
        Returns:
        the database name.
        See Also:
        SQLiteOpenHelper.getDatabaseName()

      • putOpenedDatabase

        void putOpenedDatabase()
        Put an opened database to be used by converters.

      • getDatabase

        SQLiteDatabase getDatabase()
        Get the database used by converters.
        Returns:
        the database.
